article: manifestation miracle is a revolutionary technique that teaches you on how to connect to a wonderful repository of wisdom , intelligence , and power in the whole universe , and harness that power to work according to your desires and wants . the program is based on the notion that anything a person needs has a vibration . if you 've been to a chemistry class , you probably are aware that virtually everything in the world is comprised of atoms . the atoms are in a constant state of motion . things would appear as solid , gas , or liquid depending on the speed of the atoms they are composed of .

sound , like thoughts , is also a vibration . therefore , according to the vibration manifestation , everything which manifests in your life is only there because it comports with the vibration of your own thoughts . for example , wanting a million dollars in your bank account has a different vibration from wanting only ten dollars in your bank account . thus , if you want a hundred million dollars , and you faithfully follow the precepts of the program , you will certainly get that amount . on the other hand , if you wish to have only ten dollars in your account , you will get that as well .

the secret is learning how to harness the vibration energy . in the manifestation miracle program , you will be taught on the various manifestation wavelengths . the ebook will educate you on how to effectively tap into the wavelength of the thing you want in your life . ultimately , in the program , it will be impressed upon you why you were n't able to receive that which you want in your life before . in the program you will learn how to conjure up an image of that you earnestly need , the manifestation experience you 'll have to attain that thing , and once you feel the manifestation experience of that which you need , then you are one step away from finally getting it .
